# Silk Ride - Premium Chauffeur Service Website

## Overview
Silk Ride is a luxury chauffeur service company based in London, providing premium airport transfers, corporate travel, and destination tours across the UK. This is the main marketing website built with Nuxt 3, Vue.js, and Tailwind CSS.

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Nuxt 3 (Vue.js 3)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Internationalization**: Vue i18n (English/Russian)
- **SEO**: Nuxt SEO utilities with structured data
- **Icons**: BoxIcons (bx- classes)
- **Deployment**: Static site generation

## Key Services
1. **Airport Transfers**: Heathrow, Gatwick, Stansted, Luton
2. **Destination Tours**: Oxford, Cambridge, Bath, Cotswolds, Stonehenge
3. **Corporate Travel**: Executive transport and business meetings
4. **Fleet**: Mercedes S-Class, E-Class, V-Class vehicles

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- `/` - Homepage with hero, services, fleet overview
- `/fleet` - Vehicle fleet (S-Class, E-Class, V-Class details)
- `/services` - Service categories and offerings
- `/about` - Company information and licensing details
- `/contact-us` - Contact form and company details
- `/booking` - Online booking system (3rd party EasyTaxi widget)
- `/faq` - Frequently asked questions (18 comprehensive Q&As)

### Airport Transfer Pages
- `/airport-transfers/heathrow` - Heathrow Airport chauffeur service
- `/airport-transfers/gatwick` - Gatwick Airport transfers (North/South terminals)
- `/airport-transfers/stansted` - Stansted Airport service
- `/airport-transfers/luton` - Luton Airport transfers with shuttle coordination

### Destination Tour Pages
- `/destination-tours/oxford` - Oxford University city tours
- `/destination-tours/cambridge` - Cambridge University and River Cam
- `/destination-tours/bath` - Roman Baths and Georgian architecture
- `/destination-tours/cotswolds` - Countryside villages tour
- `/destination-tours/stonehenge` - Prehistoric monument visits

## Key Components

### Navigation (`components/Navbar.vue`)
- Responsive navbar with dropdown menus
- Popular Routes dropdown (airports + destinations)
- Services dropdown
- Our Company dropdown
- Mobile-friendly hamburger menu

### Fleet Components
- `components/FleetSection.vue` - Homepage fleet overview
- Individual vehicle pages with detailed specifications

### Booking System
- `components/EasyTaxiWidget/Booking.vue` - 3rd party booking integration
- Custom styling applied to iframe widget

### SEO Components
- `utils/useSeo.ts` - Centralized SEO management utility
- Structured data implementation with `useSchemaOrg`
- Comprehensive meta tags and Open Graph data

## Internationalization
Supported languages: English (en), Russian (ru)

### Key Translation Sections
- `navbar.*` - Navigation menu items
- `hero.*` - Homepage hero section
- `services.*` - Service descriptions
- `seo.*` - SEO meta data (titles, descriptions, keywords)
- `faq.*` - FAQ questions and answers
- `footer.*` - Footer links and information

## SEO Optimization

### Meta Tags Structure
All pages use `useSeo('pageKey')` utility that pulls from:
- `i18n/locales/en.json` -> `seo.{pageKey}.title`
- `i18n/locales/en.json` -> `seo.{pageKey}.description`  
- `i18n/locales/en.json` -> `seo.{pageKey}.keywords`

### Structured Data
- Local Business schema for each service area
- Geographic coordinates for service locations
- Service area definitions
- Contact information and pricing ranges

## Design System

### Colors
- **Primary Gold**: `text-gold`, `bg-gold` (custom Tailwind color)
- **Black/Gray**: Various gray scales for text and backgrounds
- **White**: Clean backgrounds and contrast text

### Typography
- **Headings**: `font-heading` class (custom font family)
- **Body**: Default system fonts with various weights
- **Responsive**: Progressive sizing (text-sm to text-6xl)

### Layout Patterns
- **Hero Sections**: Full-screen backgrounds with overlay gradients
- **Service Cards**: White cards with shadows and hover effects
- **CTAs**: Gold buttons with hover animations
- **Grid Layouts**: Responsive grids for content organization

## Booking Integration
- 3rd party EasyTaxi widget embedded in iframe
- Custom styling container around widget
- Professional header and help sections
- Mobile-responsive integration

## Performance Optimizations
- Static site generation with Nuxt
- Optimized images with WebP format
- Lazy loading for non-critical content
- Minimal JavaScript for interactive elements
- Efficient CSS with Tailwind purging

## Development Notes
- Mobile-first responsive design approach
- Accessibility considerations with proper ARIA labels
- SEO-first architecture with clean URL structure
- Component-based architecture for maintainability
- Comprehensive error handling for forms and widgets

This website serves as the primary marketing and booking platform for Silk Ride's luxury chauffeur services, focusing on conversions through professional presentation, comprehensive service information, and streamlined booking processes.
